HeroSection.badgeText: Take your business to new heights
HeroSection.title: Your Success in the USA: Get Your Own Clients Now!
HeroSection.description: Discover how StarFy Agency can boost your business with marketing strategies, paid traffic, and exclusive support for immigrant entrepreneurs.

Services.subtitle: Starring the Path to Success
Services.title: Our Services
Services.description: We offer comprehensive solutions to boost your business in the USA, focusing on tangible results.

service1.title: Website Creation and Optimization
service1.description: We develop attractive and optimized websites to enhance online presence, providing an engaging experience for visitors.

service2.title: Strategic Ads to Reach Customers
service2.description: We create highly effective online advertising campaigns, targeting the right audience to boost traffic and generate qualified leads.

service3.title: Marketing Content Strategies
service3.description: We develop engaging and strategic content to build brand authority, attract and retain audience attention, converting visitors into loyal customers.

aboutUs.subtitle: Welcome to StarFy
aboutUs.title: We are an Agency Specialized in Boosting Businesses. We make you STOP depending on others!
aboutUs.description: At StarFy, we are experts in boosting businesses. With professionalism and dedication, we offer a variety of services designed to help you grow in the market.

lowInvestHighProfit.title: Invest Little and Profit A Lot!
lowInvestHighProfit.description: Discover growth opportunities with affordable investments. At StarFy, we believe that success doesn't have to be expensive. With innovative and effective solutions, we help you achieve high profits without compromising your wallet.

testimonials.subtitle: Testimonials
testimonials.title: What our clients say about StarFy

testimonial-1.name: José Pereira
testimonial-1.quote: Hiring StarFy was the best decision for my business. They understood my needs and created strategies that really boosted sales.

testimonial-2.name: Camila Santos
testimonial-2.quote: StarFy exceeded my expectations. Their professional and innovative approach made a big difference in the visibility and growth of my company.

testimonial-3.name: Lucas Oliveira
testimonial-3.quote: I am extremely satisfied with StarFy's services. They not only understand marketing but also dedicate themselves to ensuring the success of their clients.

contact.title: We are Specialists in boosting services in the United States.
contact.description: We make you STOP depending on others to get clients!
